    aggs={
        "JapaneseCars": {
            "terms": {
                "field": "make",
                "include": [
                    "mazda",
                    "honda"
                ]
            }
        },

            "terms": {
                "field": "make",
                "exclude": [
                    "rover",
                    "jensen"
                ]
            }
        }
    },
)
